languages.text: {n}Заметив ваше приближение, Хейнрикс выпрямляется во весь свой рост.{/n} "{name}. Позволь предугадать твой вопрос: ты хочешь поговорить про то, что случилось после Магнэ Ацессио".
{n}Heinrix sees you and straightens to his full height.{/n} "{name}. Let me pre-empt your question: you want to talk about what happened after the Magnae Accessio."
languages.original_text: {n}Заметив ваше приближение, Хейнрикс выпрямляется во весь свой рост.{/n} "{name}. Позволь предугадать твой вопрос: ты хочешь поговорить про то, что случилось после Магнэ Ацессио".

languages.text: {n}Al verte, Heinrix se estira cuan largo es.{/n} «{name}. Me anticiparé a su pregunta: quiere hablar sobre lo que ocurrió después de la Magnae Accessio».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix sees you and straightens to his full height.{/n} "{name}. Let me pre-empt your question: you want to talk about what happened after the Magnae Accessio."

traits.locale_text: {n}Al verte, Heinrix se estira cuan largo es.{/n} «{name}. Me anticiparé a su pregunta: quiere hablar sobre lo que ocurrió después de la Magnae Accessio».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはこちらを見ると、背筋をピンと伸ばした。{/n}「{name} 。何を尋ねにきたのか当ててやる。マグナ・アクセシオの後に起きたことの話をしたいのだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix sees you and straightens to his full height.{/n} "{name}. Let me pre-empt your question: you want to talk about what happened after the Magnae Accessio."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはこちらを見ると、背筋をピンと伸ばした。{/n}「{name} 。何を尋ねにきたのか当ててやる。マグナ・アクセシオの後に起きたことの話をしたいのだろう」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希看到了你，立刻挺直了身子。{/n}“{name}，先让我猜猜你要问的问题吧？你想讨论一下继任颂典之后发生的那件事情。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix sees you and straightens to his full height.{/n} "{name}. Let me pre-empt your question: you want to talk about what happened after the Magnae Accessio."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希看到了你，立刻挺直了身子。{/n}“{name}，先让我猜猜你要问的问题吧？你想讨论一下继任颂典之后发生的那件事情。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se redresse de toute sa hauteur en vous apercevant.{/n} « {name}. Permettez-moi de devancer votre question : vous voulez parler de ce qu'il s'est passé après la Magnae Accessio. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix sees you and straightens to his full height.{/n} "{name}. Let me pre-empt your question: you want to talk about what happened after the Magnae Accessio."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se redresse de toute sa hauteur en vous apercevant.{/n} « {name}. Permettez-moi de devancer votre question : vous voulez parler de ce qu'il s'est passé après la Magnae Accessio. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Als Heinrix dich sieht, richtet er sich zu seiner vollen Größe auf.{/n} "{name}. Lasst mich Eurer Frage zuvorkommen: Ihr wollt darüber sprechen, was nach der Magnae Accessio geschehen ist."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix sees you and straightens to his full height.{/n} "{name}. Let me pre-empt your question: you want to talk about what happened after the Magnae Accessio."

traits.locale_text: {n}Als Heinrix dich sieht, richtet er sich zu seiner vollen Größe auf.{/n} "{name}. Lasst mich Eurer Frage zuvorkommen: Ihr wollt darüber sprechen, was nach der Magnae Accessio geschehen ist."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix sees you and straightens to his full height.{/n} ". Let me pre-empt your question: you want to talk about what happened after the Magnae Accessio."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix seni görünce dimdik doğruluyor.{/n} "{name}. Söylemeden tahmin edeyim... Magnae Accessio sonrası olanları soracaksın."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix sees you and straightens to his full height.{/n} "{name}. Let me pre-empt your question: you want to talk about what happened after the Magnae Accessio."
